bool ImageMetrics::getMetrics ( double &  FM,
double &  PR,
double &  RC,
double &  GA,
double &  MSE,
double &  TNR,
double &  ACC,
double &  PSNR,
double &  BRP,
double &  BRR,
double &  FNR 
)

Returns differents measures FM - Fmeasure PR - Precission RC - Recall GA - Geometrical Arithmetic TNR - True Negative Rate PSNR - Peak signal-to-noise ratio ACC - Acurracy BRP - Black Rate Predicted (ratio of black pixels in prediction) BRR - Black Rate Reference

References ImageMetrics::false_negatives, ImageMetrics::false_positives, ImageMetrics::n_samples, ImageMetrics::SSE, ImageMetrics::true_negatives, and ImageMetrics::true_positives.
